an4.5:1.3: Anusotagami puggalo, patisotagami puggalo, thitatto puggalo, tinno parangato thale titthati brahmano.
an4.5:1.5: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo kame ca patisevati, papanca kammam karoti.
an4.5:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo kame ca nappatisevati, papanca kammam na karoti, sahapi dukkhena sahapi domanassena assumukhopi rudamano paripunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam carati.
an4.5:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya opapatiko hoti, tattha parinibbayi, anavattidhammo tasma loka.
an4.5:4.1: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo tinno parangato thale titthati brahmano?
an4.5:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati.
an4.5:4.3: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo tinno parangato thale titthati brahmano.
an4.5:4.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro puggala santo samvijjamana lokasminti.
